allow: Bash(git add server/src/app.js server/src/controllers/knowledgeBaseController.js server/src/models/KnowledgeBase.js server/src/routes/knowledgeBaseRoutes.js server/src/services/documentProcessor.js server/src/services/ragService.js server/tests/rag.test.js src/pages/KnowledgeBase/KnowledgeBaseUpload.jsx src/services/api.js src/components/knowledge-base/)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add custom domain CORS support and improve PPT chunking

- Add tu2tor.com and www.tu2tor.com to CORS allowed origins
- Implement slide-based chunking strategy for PPTX files
- Add chunk visualization component with modal UI
- Fix canAccess method validation to prevent undefined errors
- Add AI chunking response validation with fallback
- Improve PPTX text extraction with multi-level splitting strategy

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
